translations: 最小化的；最小化；使达到最低限度的
使减少；使缩到最小；极度轻视（minimize 的过去分词形式）

sentences.sentence: Some have minimized the importance of ideological factors.
sentences.translation: 一些人已经贬低了意识形态因素的重要性。

sentences.sentence: Generally speaking, face-to-face communication with an instructor is minimized or eliminated altogether.
sentences.translation: 一般来说，与讲师面对面交流的机会缩减到最少，甚至完全取消。

sentences.sentence: Almost all of the interior detail is of cast iron or plaster; the use of wood was minimized to insure fire safety.
sentences.translation: 几乎所有的内部细节都是由铸铁或石膏铸成的；减少木材的使用是出于确保消防安全的考虑。
